TopicTitle: Eve Online De-Mystified and Faction/Corporations Gameplay Live Stream Tonite !

Articles.Content:
Greetings.

It seems as to I need to take a break from KSP sad but true...I am not able to reliably stream any MMOs until I get a better cooling system for my new CPU and my ISP upload aint all that or I got other issues I havnt had time to fix yet.

I certainly cant stream any MMOs anymore as it is too taxking on my computer.

It was fun while it lasted and I will be back streaming KSP someday soon I hope.

I had read a thread somewhere in the forum about there being an Eve Corp out of here; maybe on STO as well I forget.

Well I am back over to Eve Online and trying to enjoy it again...trying ! Sometimes you have to just pay for that SUB and enjoy life and not being so stressed trying to play a game for free; Eve Online is such a game.

I will attempt for the first time try and De-Mystify just exactly what EO is and how new players can alleviate that intial overwhelmness; wish me luck !

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Cdr Zeta:cool:
